113b7: pas lta ba'i zag pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na sbrul gdug pa'i za ma tog rnyed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin
113b8: gshegs pas lta ba'i zag pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / bye ma bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas lte ba'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste/

114a1: dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sbrul gdug pa'i za ma tog la dga' ba'i 'dun pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni med tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas lta ba'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa
114a2: ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab du mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas lta ba'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi la ma na
114a3: sbrul gdug pa'i zam tog chag pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas lta ba'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gsheg
114a4: pas lta ba'i zag pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen pa nas ming tsam gyi bar du'o/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/
114a5: 'di lta ste dper na/ dbus long gi rmi lam na gzugs mthong ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim
114a6: bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ dmus long gi rmi lam na chu'i sgra skad grag pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin
114a7: du de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog pa
114a8: shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ dmus long sgom pa'i rmi lam na btung ba rnam par bskams pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa

114b1: 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/
114b2: 'di lta ste dper na/ dmus long gi rmi lam na mun pa dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ma rig pa'i zag pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed
114b3: pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na 'dod chags zhe
114b4: sdang gti mug spang ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs/
114b5: pas zad pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du
114b6: de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa
114b7: 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ dmus long gi rmi lam na nor chud gzan pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa 'gog pa
114b8: shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang med pa tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te//

115a1: 'di lta ste dper na/ dmus long gi rmi laman snang bathob pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas zad pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar ra
115a2: tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na me skye ba shes pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa ji
115a3: snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na zad pa dang
115a4: mi skye ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs
115a5: pas ma skye ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nor ma rnyed pa'i rnyed pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba
115a6: shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di la
115a7: ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam no nor rab tu nyams pa'i mi skye ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni meng tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi skye ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid
115a8: kyang med tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na shes

115b1: pa thams cad khong du chud pas mi 'jigs pa shes pas ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de
115b2: bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na chos yongs su dris pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas ma
115b3: 'jigs pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa nyid kyang med tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/
115b4: sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na chos ji ltar bzung ba rnams kyi rab tu 'jig pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du
115b5: de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na 'gog pa'i
115b6: chos rjes su dran pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mi 'jigs pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de
115b7: bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi lam na brag ca'i sgra brnyan gyi spobs pa don rnam par rig par byed pa nyid kyi sgra ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam
115b8: ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa kun 'byung

116a1: bshes pa 'di ltar rab du mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi laman phrag ca 'don shes te/ don shes pa kun 'byung ba shes/ don shes pa 'gog pa shes/ don shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes/ chos
116a2: shes te chos shes pa kun 'byung ba shes/ chos shes pa 'gog pa shes/ chos shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes/ nges pa'i tshig shes te/ nges pa'i tshig shes pa kun 'byung ba shes/ nges pa'i tshig shes pa 'gog
116a3: ba shes/ nges pa'i tshig shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa shes te/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa
116a4: shes pa 'gog pa shes/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa kun
116a5: 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/
116a6: mo'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mtshan mo mun pa mun nag dag nas snang ba dang bral ba'i bar ji snyed pa nyid ni mi cas ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'gog pa zhes pa nying ba nyid
116a7: kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i/
116a8: skyes bu'i rmi lam na snang ba dang bral ba'i shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam

116b1: du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na kun rjod pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de
116b2: bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper
116b3: na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa mngon par 'du byed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to//
116b4: khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa shes pa dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/
116b5: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa'inyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes pa 'gog par 'gyur
116b6: pa'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa thabs mkhas shing shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid shes
116b7: pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di
116b8: lta ste dper na/ sgyu mi'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na byams pa la gnas pa shes pa dang / snying rje la gnas pa shes pa dang / dga' ba la gnas pa shes pa dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam

117a1: dbang po dang bral ba dang / brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes
117a2: paji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/
117a3: ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam nang rgyal gyi shes pa la 'jug pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du
117a4: de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na nga rgyal la
117a5: dbang byed pa dang bral ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim
117a6: bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi la man lam rnyed pa ji snyed pa
117a7: da ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin
117a8: gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na lus bskyod pa shes pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang

117b1: !/ dashan du shan ga/ shegs pas pazhan ga pa gnas pa shes pa ji skad pa nyid kyang shA sa du lta ba rnyan// / ga/ / sag sa ba tan
117b2: 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ / 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na byams pa la gnas pa'i shes pa rtogs pa dang / snying rje la gnas pa'i shes pa rtags pa dang / dka' ba la gnas pa'i sa
117b3: partogs pa dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa'i shes pa rtogs pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming
117b4: tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / bye ma bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab du mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam
117b5: nashes pa 'gog pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to//
117b6: byam bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tum khyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na thabs
117b7: mkhas pa'i shes pa khong du chud pa ji snyed pa nyid ni mi tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang med
117b8: tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag da la de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi las na dad pa'i

118a1: ming nam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i thil ma na bya ba la
118a2: 'jug pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas
118a3: lus kyi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na til mar gyi mar me bus pa zad cing zhi ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshes
118a4: pas lus kyi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar
118a5: rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na lus kyi las yongs su shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas lus kyi las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes
118a6: pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na brdzun du smra ba 'am/ brdzun du smra ba
118a7: las ldog pa 'am/ bra ma'i ngag gam phra ma'i ngag las ldog pa 'am/ tshig rtsub po'i ngag gam/ tshig nub po'i ngag las ldog pa 'am/ tshig kyal pa 'am/ tshig kyal pa las ldog pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du na
118a8: bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de lta rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di

118b1: da nga / snga ma zlas su rmil ban ma bstan pags par zad pa nyad na mang ma na/ da ban dung banan gagags pas gagayas gas pa dun 'thung bags pa snad pa nyid byung mang mdu gang rab dum /
118b2: khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas dag gi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na ngag gi las 'gog pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste// de bzhin du
118b3: de bzhin gshegs pas dag gi las shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag da la de bzhin gshegs pas ngag gi las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa
118b4: 'di ltar rab du babyin te/ 'di sa ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi la man zos pa dang mthos pa yongs su shes pa de snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas dag gi las shes pa 'gog par 'thur bar
118b5: lab shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang med tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi las shes pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na
118b6: bar snang la rimo 'dri ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi las shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi las
118b7: shes pa kur 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab du mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sna ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na rim 'dri ba'i bzo shes pa ji skad pa nyid ni ming tsam ste// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ ming tsam
118b8: bya bar dus khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi las shes pa 'gag pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta sted dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmil ma nang mo 'dri ba'i bskal pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ bzhi

119a1: dre bzhin gshegs pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te ming tsam gyi bar du'o/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ snum
119a2: skyes bu'i rmi lam na slob dpon gyis bstan pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas yid kyi las shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab du mkhyen to//
119a3: bam po bcu gcig pa// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sngon du mgyogs pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin
119a4: gshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sku
119a5: ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na phyogs dag tu don gyi bsam pa ji snyed pa nyid ni mang tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim
119a6: bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ / 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sngon du mgyogs pa shi ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin
119a7: gshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar
119a8: rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na phyogs dag tu don grub pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon du 'gro ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa

119b1: nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su 'jug pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ mi la man rnam par sad pa byed pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/
119b2: bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su 'jug pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su 'jug pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu
119b3: mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na rnam par sad pa shes pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su 'jug pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang med tsam du
119b4: ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su 'jug pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na ma shi ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/
119b5: bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su 'jug pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su 'jug pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes
119b6: pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na mi mthun pa'i rtsa ba yang dag par gcod pa ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te ming tsam gyi bar du'o// khyim
119b7: bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su mi nyams pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na/ dug 'thungs pa'i rtsi sman ma lus par byed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni
119b8: ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su mi nyams pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su mi nyams

120a1: bshes pa dun 'drung ba shes pa 'di snang btum khyen te / 'dis skyed par na sgyu ma'i rjes du rtsilaman du khyen pa la du ga sa ma 'ad da ga na ma la// de shin bzhin gshegs papa yong pa bu ma nya sa
120a2: pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyi ma bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su mi nyams pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/
120a3: bla ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na dug yang mi 'byung ba ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su mi nyams pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim
120a4: bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su mi nyams pa shes pa 'gog pa shes par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na dug byin pa la yang dag pa'i
120a5: gso ba'i dbyang byed pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su mi nyams pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim
120a6: bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na rtsi sman mkhan don la mkhas pa dang / nad kun nas ldang ba la mkhas
120a7: pa dang / nad pa'i khams la mkhas pa dang / sman skyong ba la mkhas pa dang / kha zas kyi cho ga la mkhas pa dang / khrus kyi cho ga la mkhas pa dang / bsku mnye'i cho ga la mkhas pa dang / rkang pas mnye ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa dang /
120a8: lag pas mnye ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa dang / nyal po'i cho ga la mkhas pa dang / sad pa'i cho ga la mkhas pa dang / longs spyod kyi cho ga la mkhas pa dang / dpyad kyi sbyor ba 'jug pa la mkhas pa dang / dus shes/ tshod shes/ dus

120b1: men gas gang su ma'i gyub bu ldand/ gis na thams pad 'doms pa shes par byed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du bzhin gshegs pas thams cadan khyen pa shes pa byed pa ny-id kyang me tsa mdud lta rab tu mkhyen na/
120b2: khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam na sprul pa'i gso ba'i dpyad shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/
120b3: de bzhin du bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu ma khyen to// khyi ma bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa shes pa 'gog pa shes pa
120b4: 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam nand thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa shes pa ji snyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa shes pa 'gog pa shes paji
120b5: rnyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de la de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa shes pa 'gog par gyur pa'i lam shes pa 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rmi lam
120b6: nagaso ba'i dpyad ji rnyed pa nyid ni ming tsam ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mkhyen pa shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam shes pa ji snyed pa nyid kyang ming tsam du de ltar rab tu mkhyen to// khyim bdag de lta
120b7: bas na 'dir gang gi ye shes mthong ba thogs pa med par 'jug pa gzhan gyis ma bstan cing / gzhan la rag ma las pa'i shes pas sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i don du bdag nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/
120b8: de ni tsan dan gyi byams dang / khang bzang gi bar 'di la longs spyod par 'gyur ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag bla mkhan gyis lag gi batshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di gad ces smras so// gang po bcom ldan 'das de da ltar/

121a1: gang na bzhugs/ de skad ces smras pa dang / lag gi bla gang pos khyim bdag zla mkhan la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag byang phyogs logs na kos la zhes bya ba'i yul gyi ljongs yod de/ gas ri'i rgyal po'i drungan
121a2: mnyan yod ces bya ba grong khyer chen po de na rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de da ltar bzhugs so// de skad ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag bya
121a3: mkhan gyis lag gi bla tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ / gang po mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po 'di nas ring kyad ci tsam smras pa/ khyim bdag de dpag tshad sum stong drug bcu rtsa bzhi yod do// de skad ces smras pa dang /
121a4: khyim bdag phywa mkhan gyis lag gi bla tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// gang po ring bde nas bcom ldan 'ad deji srid cig gis 'dir byon smras pa/ khyim bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la ni ring ba 'am nye ba med de/ khyim
121a5: bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhed na/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir grangs med pa'i gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed las lhag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig dag tu gshegs so// khyim bdag 'di la de bzhin gshegs
121a6: pas sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa dag mkhyen/ shin du mkhyen/ shin du gzigs/ shin du thugs su chud/ shin du mngon sum du mdzad de/ mig btsums pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod
121a7: dag rab du mkhyen to/ / khyim bdag de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhed na sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i blo nye bar gzhag nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams khrag khrig dag du gshegs so// gang po bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su
121a8: gzung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de zhal zas bzang po la nye bar spyan drangs na gshegs sam/ khyim bdag gal te cung zad yongs su gtod pa lta na de bzhin gshegs pa de zhal zas gtsang ma la spyan drangs shig dang / khyod kyi dge

121b1: ba'i rtsab yongs su gzung ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gshegs so/ / de nas kyi ma bdag bya mkhan gyis tshe dang ldan pa gang po'i ltar mnyan nas/ me tog dang phreng ba dang / bdug pa dag grangs te/
121b2: tsan dan gyi khyams dang khangs bzangs kyi steng du 'dzegs nas me tog gis rgyan/ spos kyis blugs nas bcom ldan 'das de phyogs gang logs na bzhugs pa de phyogs nas gos phrag pa gcig dru gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lnga
121b3: ngas la bcugs nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs rtse ba nye bar dgongs te/ zhal zas bzang po la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge slong gi dge
121b4: 'dun dang thabs gcig tu gshegs par ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na bzhugs pa/ mi las 'das pa lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa'i khams kyis khyim bdag bya mkhan gyis spyan drangs pa gsan nas
121b5: gshegs par gnang ngo / / de nas khyim bdag phywa mkhan gyis bcom ldan 'das mngon par spyan drangs te/ bran dang las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / sdug gi gnyen mtshams dag la 'di skad ces
121b6: smras so/ / khyed cag nyon cig ngas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par zhal zas bzang po la spyan drangs kyis/ de la khyed nus pa ci yod pa
121b7: dpa ma ci yod pa'i lus kyis zhal ta bya ba la brtson pa dang ldan par gyis shig khyim dag blam khan gyis de skad ces smras pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / nyadra dang / sdug gi gnyen mtshams dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang /
121b8: zho shas 'tsho bdag gis khyim bdag phywa mkhan la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag smos so// khyim bdag g.yengs so// gang bcom ldan 'das de ma mthong bar zhal zas bzang po la spyan 'dren tam/ khyim bdag rtswa mkhan gyis bcom

122a1: ldan 'das de sman 'dren to zhes sus gsol/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / khyim pa dag blam pan gyis mdza' ba shes dang / blon po dang / nye du dang / sdug gi gnyen mtshams dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho gas
122a2: 'tshe ba dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ / grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das de sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dpag tu med pa dag brnyes te/ des nga'i sems mkhyen nas gnang ngo // de dag mgu zhing dga' la yid rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' zhing bde
122a3: ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas de'i mtshan mo bza' ba dang / bca' ba bzang zhing rab tu mang po mngon par yang dag par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de phye ma red kyi dus su nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/ smyig ma'i lum bu'i
122a4: 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba der gshegs so/ / de'i tshe smyig ma'i ldum bu'i 'khor gyi khyams na/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong rab du mang po dag dang lhan cig 'dus nas 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
122a5: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po na dge slong nye bar gnas shing 'khod pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rim 'gro'i gnas su 'dus nas nga la sbron cig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun
122a6: dga' bos de ltar 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po na dge slong nye bar gnas shing 'khod pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rim 'gro'i gnas su 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal
122a7: bzhugs pa der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po na dge slong nye bar gnas shing mchis pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas su 'dus lags te/ bcom ldan
122a8: 'das de'i dus la dbab lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rim 'gro'i gnas ga la ba der gshegs nas gdan bcas bde la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong grong khyer chen po dge ba'i pha

122b1: rol 'gro na khyim bdag phywa mkhan gyis sangs rgyas dang dge slong gis dge 'dun la sogs pa mngon par spyan drangs te/ de ngas gnang gis de'i phyir dge slong gang dag rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa de dag gis tshul shing long shig/ de'i tshe
122b2: na dge slong lnga rgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gang dag gis tshul shing blangs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rdzu 'phrul gyi 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sems can dag yang dag
122b3: par dga' bar bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' las 'dod par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i mtshan mo 'das nas
122b4: nang par sngar smad g.yogs dang / tshes gos gsol/ lhung bzed bsnams te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chal nas nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ grong khyer chen po dge ba'i pha rol 'gro ga la bder gshegs so//
122b5: tshe dang ldan pa shing shun can rgyal po'i khab na drang srong gi'i ngos la spa dang / shing pib pa la skye ba na 'dug la/ nam gyi cha stod dang / cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor la brtson te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
122b6: bcu rtsa bdun dag bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su brtson zhing / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la mngon par brtson pa 'chag cing 'gro ba des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu nam mkha'i lam nas
122b7: gshegs pa mthong ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ dang pa'i rgyal po ltar mthong nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyarab btud nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
122b8: ldan pa shing shun can la bka' stsal pa/ shing shun can tshur shog/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shing shun can bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal par rig nas/ lus dang srog la ma ltas par ngam grog dang g.yang sa de la bdag nyid

123a1: mchongs so/ / de bar snang la song ma thag tu mngon par shes pa drug mngon sum du byas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dang shing shun can dang / dgra bcom pa lnga brgya tshad bar thabs gcig tu grong khyer
123a2: chen po dge ba'i pha rol 'gro ga la ba der gshegs so/ / de nas dge slong de dag rdzu 'phrul gyi 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis tsan dan gyi khyams dang khang bzangs der mngon par zhugs te/ la la ni seng ge rig
123a3: la la ni stag gi gzugs/ la la ni glang po che'i gzugs/ la la ni rta'i gzugs/ la la ni khyu mchog gi gzugs/ la la ni klu'i gzugs/ la la ni nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i gzugs/ la la ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i
123a4: gzugs/ la la ni blon po'i gzugs/ la la ni dge slong rang gi gzugs/ la la ni lus las 'od sngon po dag rab tu 'byin/ la la ni dmar po dang / la la ni dkar po dang / la la ni lus las 'od btsod kha dag rab tu 'byin/ la la ni/
123a5: char 'bebs/ la la ni rlung rab tu gtong / la la ni nor gyi char rab tu 'bebs/ la la ni gser gyi char rab tu 'bebs/ la la ni dngul gyi char rab tu 'bebs/ la la ni spos chu'i char rab tu 'bebs/ la la ni ser bu bsil ba rab tu
123a6: gtong / la la ni phrag pa sa la khyer/ la la ni rgya mtsho chen por chu 'bebs pa khyer/ la la ni shing rta la zhon/ la la ni glang po che'i shing rta la zhon/ la la ni rta'i shing rta la zhon/ la las ni klu'i shing rta mngon par sprul/
123a7: la las ni bral bum gyi shing rta mngon par sprul/ la las ni gnod sbyin gyi shing rta mngon par sprul/ la las ni dri ba'i sheng rta mngon par sprul/ la las ni tsha 'phrul dag zung du stsal/ la las ni bdag lus las me 'byer
123a8: las ni bdag gi lus las chu 'dzag ste/ de dag la sogs pa tshe 'phrul gyi 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag gis kyang tsan dan gyi khyams dang / khang bzangs su mngon par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das ni bdag nyid kyi

123b1: dam po brkyang bas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcucu gnyis kyis ni yang dag par bcam dang byad bzang po rgyad bcus ninas pa pa/ / sangs shing dang ba dang / ldan ni thugs / sa pa dang / zhiganas dam
123b2: ni brnyes/ / dul ba dang gi gnas mchog gi pha rol du byin/ mi mdzod kyi bdag pa tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gong dag gis ni b+hag byas/ bdud rtsi
123b3: gyi rgyun rab tu 'bebs shing mchod pa dang / me tog man dA ra ba'i char 'bebs shing / tsan dan gyi khyams dang khang bzangs su mngon par gshegs te/ de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thas
123b4: gcig tu sems can dag yang dag par dga' bar mdzad cing tsan dan gyi khyams dang / khang bzangs su mngon par gshegs so// dge ba'i pha rol 'gro'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
123b5: 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bar snang las gshegs pa mthong ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ ngang ba'i rgyal po chen po lta bur mthong nas/ srog chags khri dag chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral te rnam par dag go// /
123b6: gang dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la spyad pa'i srog chags khri dag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul mthong nas byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed ma thag tu mi skye ba'i
123b7: chos la bzod pa thob po/ / sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i srog chags khri dag gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do// nyan thos dag gis 'dul ba'i srog chags brgyad khri dag ni nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul mthong nas chos rnams la
123b8: chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral te rnam par dag go/ / lha'i bu khri dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul mthong nas chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral te rnam par dag go// gzugs na spyod

124a1: z hu ga
124a2: po'i bu gtsug phung lnga pa la spras pa/ gtsug phung lnga pa de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sti byis shig dri za'i rgyal po'i bu gtsug phud lnga pas de ltar 'tshal zhes lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi ltar mnyan te/ dri zas
124a3: ya brag drug dang / lhan gcig tu rgyud kyi dbyangs dang / klu'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur ni byed do// rol mo'i sgra dang kru swa de dag gis rgya mtsho chen po'i klung rgyal po dag rab tu dga' zhing bde ba dang yid bdeb
124a4: kyis nas rang rang gi gnas nas byung ngo / / de dag byung bas rgya mtsho chen po na 'byung po chen po dag gis gnas rnam par 'khrugs so// klu'i rgyal po mdzes pa la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag brgya dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir
124a5: rgyamatsho chen po nas bskyod do/ / klu'i rgyal po lha mdzes la sogs bkru dung b+hur phrag dgu dag bcom ldan 'das blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bskyod do// 'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dag
124a6: bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po nas bskyod do/ / klu'i rgyal po gser gtsug la sogs pa klu drang phyur phrag dgu dag bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir bskyod do// klu'i rgyal po ud pa la mig la sogs pa klu dung ra
124a7: phrag dgu dag bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir bskyod do/ / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo la sogs pa klu dung pUr thag dgu nas de bzhin du sbyar te thams cad la yang bya'o// klu'i rgyal po nye dga' la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu' rgyal po
124a8: ma dros pa la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po e rA pa Na la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po cheb pa'i bu la stsogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po mi gnag pa la sogs pa klu dur phyur phrag

124b1: dad srim pago/ ma la sa ga / rgyas gas sogs pazla pag ba dag rtsal pams 'khong ma gas b+ha d+hA r+dz+dza n+d+ha dang / rnam pa brjod ny-i
124b2: bzung byar thag dgra dang kwa'i rgyal po gsar mkhyen la sogs pa rba dung b+har thasha dgra dang / klu'i rgyal po 'jigs grol la sogs pa gu drung byur zug dgra dag / gra rgyal pog sa can sogs pa ba dung byung phrag da dge zu kyi
124b3: rnam par snang byed la sogs bkru dung phyur brag dgra dang / klu'i rgyal po rdul bral la sogs pa gru drang pur phrag dgranas de bzhin du byar te/ gru dargyal po 'odi chen la sogs pa dang / gru'i rgyal po rab drugadung byed la sogs pa dang / klul
124b4: rgyal po stobs chen la sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin chen la sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po bla chen la sogs pa kru dung phyur phrag dgu dang / rlung yang dag par ston pa la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po shugs
124b5: 'dzin la sogs pa klu dung phyur phrag dgu dang / kwa'i rgyal po sprin chen la sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rab tu gdul dga' la sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad ma long zhes bya ba kru dung byur phrag dgu dang / klu'i rgyal po char chen
124b6: spyod la sogs pa klu dred b+hur phrag dgu dang / bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po nas bskyod do// de dag la sogs pa kru bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa gzhan dag dang / 'khor dung phyur phrag dgu
124b7: dge bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir rgya mtsho chen pos nas bskyod do/ / de dag gis rgya mtsho chen po dkrugs so// dge slong de dag gis kyang grong khyer dang / khrong brdal dang / tshong dras dang / ri 'ong sa dang bcas pa bkrugs so//
124b8: de nasas rnamapa du mar g.yos/ rab tu g.yos kun du rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ de nas khyim bdag cub mkhan gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa

125a1: dge slong gi dge 'dun la bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / byang ba bzang shing rab tumang po rang ga lagags yang dag par tsam par byas shing yang dag par thams so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis na rdza/
125a2: rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag su'i bsod snyoms kyang yongs su bza' bar mi bya ste/ zong khyer chen po dge ba'i pha rol 'gro ba 'di klu dkrugs pa dag gis grong khyer ma rung bar byas sa de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
125a3: bsod snyoms bzhes nas nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ ngang pa'i rgyal po chen po bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun phyir bkye nas/ gnas su sprul pa brgya stong phrag dpag
125a4: du med pa dag mngon par sprul to/ / der klu'i rgyal po gang dag bcom ldan 'das blta bar 'dod pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa mngon par sprul to// klu'i rgyal po gang dag bcom ldan 'das la ma dad cing lta bar mi
125a5: 'dod pa de dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dpag tu med pa dag mngon par sprul to/ / der klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dpag tu med pa dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo//
125a6: bye ba khrag khrig dngag tumed pa dag ni sangs rgyas la dad pa skyes so// dedag da pa thob ma thag tu gyu'i skyes gnas de nas shi ste/ de 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thu
125a7: than thag gdu med pa de dag btul nas bsod snyoms pa zhes to bar srang la gshegs so/ / de'i tshan yul lag ya pa / su mes byin zhes bya bzhig gnas te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam ma'i'i ba
125a8: snang las gshegs pa mthong ngo / / demathong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la shin du gus pa bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la mtshan ma'i rnam pa de bzhin du mdzad du

125b1: gsol/ / gang dag bdag gi gnas 'dir bzhugs na mchod par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ral pa can mes byin gyi bsam pa thugs su chung nas/ skye bo bI ma dag nyid la thugs brje ba'i slad du rdol ba l+ya zhabs
125b2: bzhag go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ral pa can mes byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bram ze khyod kyi sems dang bar bya ba'i don du 'di ni mchod rten no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo 'ugal gyi
125b3: khu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mau gal gyi bu tshur shog ma dros pa'i mchog la ba der 'dod do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'i gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi lter mnyan nas/
125b4: klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i gnas kyi nu 'gram du bzhugs so// de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gshegs par rig nas gser dang / dngul dang / be du r+ya dang /
125b5: shel dang mu tig dmar po dang / spug gi snying po dang rdo'i snying po rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i stan lnga brgya tsam zhig mngon par sprul to// bri stan lnga brgya de dag gi dbus su bcom ldan 'das kyi gang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gdan
125b6: bshams te/ klu'i ras bcos bus g.yogs so// de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa klu'i bu mo 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis drung du song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u gal gyi bu chen po zan zos shing sbrang
125b7: bzed dang lag pa bkrus par thugs su chud nas bka' stsal pa/ mau'o gal gyi bu song la gnas brtan shA ri bu khyod la ston pa 'bod do zhes smros shig/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u gal gyi bu chen po
125b8: bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba bskum pa de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa mo cag la gyi bu chen po ma dros pa'i mtshonas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed

126a1: kye tshalan cha dang ldan pa shA rI'i bu'i mdun na 'dug go/ / de'i chan ma dang ldan pa shA ri'i ba snam sbyar 'thub par gyur to// de nas tsha dang ldan pa mo kal gyi bu chen po che dang ldan pa shA de'i bu dang ldan cig du yang dag par dkan/
126a2: ba'i gtam dang gtam snyan pa rnam pa mang po bas nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bra la 'di skad ces smras so// ston pa ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khong la 'bod do// ston pa khyod la mngon par dgyes kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA rI'i bu chur shog/ ston
126a3: pa khyod la gsung gis 'dong ngo / / de skad ces smras pa dang / cha dang ldan pa shA rI'i bus tshe dang ldan pa moH/ la gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa mon gal gyi bu chen por shig snam sbyar 'di 'tshem mo// de nas cha dang ldan
126a4: ba mau'i gal gyi bu chen pos sor mo lnga khab lngar mngon par sprul nas snam sbyar de btsems so/ / de nas tsha dang ldan pa shA rI'i bus tshe dang ldan pa mo gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u gal gyi bu 'di ci
126a5: byed smras pa/ sngam sbyar bcom par bya ba 'di myur du bcom par bya'o// smras pa drub pa dang / zin pa nyid du gyis shig/ de ma thag tu rngub cing zin pa nyid du byas nas/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA rI'i bu chur shog da 'dod/ spras pa mi 'gro// smras
126a6: pa gal te khyed mi 'gron stobs kyis bkur ro/ / smras pa tshe dang ldan pa mo chugal gyi bu re shig rags 'di stobs kyis khyer nus dang nga stobs kyis khyer bar shes so// des ske rags de'i'ajig rten gyi khams bdun du byin gyis rnam
126a7: so/ nas tshadang ldan pa mo 'u gal gyi bu chen pos ni/ rags de rdza 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bteg pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di g.yos kyang ske rags de gdeg par mnus so// de nas ma dros pa'i
126a8: rlabs shin dragayos so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du dogs chen po g.yos pa bung ba 'di rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa

126b1: dag pa nal thal la'i gang sa ga stsu gnyam ma can ba gsas/ / ngan pa dang na ma ca na sa dza na sa / dang zhu na
126b2: cig bdag tha mchi'o/ / de skad smras nas/ tsha dang ldan pa shA rI'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi stan sngar song nas zhabs la mgabs phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// cha dang ldan pa mo'u gal gyi 'chen po ni phyi nas 'ang // tsha dang ldan
126b3: pa shwa rI'i bu mngon du phyogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pas de dang por bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan ma de lta bu byung ba mdzad pa'i mtshan mjilta pa rung ba mdzad pas rgya mtsho'i klu'i
126b4: rgyal po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po mdzes dgas 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs bye na bcom ldan 'das de
126b5: bzhin gshegs pa la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ / bka' stsal pa/ mdzes dga' ngas zhus pa lung bstan pa'i phyir 'di ltar thams cad skabs dbye bar bya'o// tshigs su bcad pa/ ston pa bde byin mdzad la zhu ba ni// sAd baspyod tsha
126b6: sug las ci bgyis dang / / bde ba'i lam gyis mya ngan 'das reg pa// bde gshegs sbyin mdzad de ni lung bstan gsol// ma zos klu yis 'jig rten mgon de la// zhus pa bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan pa// dge ba'i las kyi
126b7: 'bras bus yid zhi zhing / / gang gi bde bas bde bar gshegs pa bskyed// sngon gyi srid par spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// skye bo thams cad bde bas bde ldan byas// de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na// bde ba'i lam gyis mya ngan
126b8: 'das reg 'gyur/ / ston pa'i gsung gis mdzes pa de dga' nas// de yi skad cigs steng bus gtsugs te// gzhal med dga' yi sems ni dad pas su// 'jig rten sgron ma 'dren la phyag 'tshal byed// ston pa'i blo yis mkhas la

127a1: phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'gro ba kun las nges byung phyag 'tshal lo// 'jigs med blo dag pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bde gshegs gzhan min gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas klu'i rgyal po lha mdzes kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshogs su
127a2: bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhus pa/ 'od mdzad spyan sdug legs pa'i spyan mnga' ga/ blod ge nyon mongs tshogs las rnam grol zhing // ye shes dri med spyod yul khyod la ni// spyad spyod tshe rnam thar bla med zhu// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten sman srad du//
127a3: ji ltar spyad na byang chub zhi 'tshal zhing // mi mchog dam pa bdag gi spyod spyod pa// yid 'das de dag bdag la bka' stsal gsol// rgyal ba de yis rdul bcom dbang po bsdams// 'dod pa'i 'ching las thugs ni rnam grol ba'i// dgongs
127a4: pas de nyid sems kyi rjes 'jug pa/ / thugs zhim dkrugs des ni lung bstan pa// mkhas pas dge ba'i dag ni spyad pa'i phyir// srog gi phyir yang yid ni mi ldog cing // rtag tu spyod tshe nyon mongs med yid kyis// lus dang ngag gi dge ba ma 'am
127a5: spyod pa/ / de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na// 'khor ba'i 'gro la spyod pa rnam dag ste// chu yi nang nas pad mo skye bltar// gos pa med cing byang chub yang dag 'grub// bde gshegs gsung gis lha'i mdzes pa klu/ de ni dga' zhing legs/
127a6: par mgubs su// de'i skad cigs la bus gtsugs te// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog la phyag 'tshal byed// thub pa 'jig rten kun la sman mdzad pa// blo gros nges par zhi la phyag 'tshal lo// spyod pa spyod cha khyod kyi rjes slob
127a7: ci / byang chub mi g.yo'i yid ni bskyed par bgyi// sems can don tu spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// lus dang srog ni de bzhin btang nas su// sdug bsngal thar byed sangs rgyas 'gyur ba dang // byang chub zhi ba bla med thob par bkye// kA de'i bsam
127a8: pa thugs su chud nas su/ / rgyal bas dgra las rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad de// de tshe ji ltar gang gA'i byed snyed kyi// sangs rgyas mtha' yas zheng ni 'od kyis khyab// bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa bstan pa la// nam mkha'i lhas rig

127b1: legs so zhes gsol te/ / e ma'o rgyal bas rdul bcom dbang po bsgoms// khyod dang mnyam med gong na yod ma yin// sangs rgyas zhing mang dag ni rab g.yos shing // 'dod pa'i lha ni sder bcas shin tu rmongs// lha tshogs mang po
127b2: bsam par bdaga' zhing / / rgyal ba dbang po thub la phyag 'tshal byed// ston pa'i nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che ba'i mchog/ moT ga la bus kyis rgyal la yongs zhus pa// gang gis dpag tu med pa'i 'dzum mdzad pa// bcom ldan
127b3: bde gshegs rgyu gang rten gang lags/ / mo gal bu yis rgyal la nyer zhus pa// the tsom gcod mdzad rgyal bas bka' stsal pa// ngal mchod pa byed pa'i klu 'di ni/ sa 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas 'gyur/ ji snyed zhing 'di
127b4: 'od kyis khyab pa dag/ de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i zhid cig 'gyur// des na rgyal ba 'di ltar 'gyur ba ste// 'dren pa de ming dbang po rgyal mtshan no// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas dag/ des ni 'gro srid pha rol
127b5: sgrol byed de/ 'di la rten nas ngas ni 'dzum pa bstan// mo Ta gal bu khyod de ltar shes par gyis// klu de lung bstan pa ni thos nas su// blan med pa dag gi dga' bas khyab// lung bstan thos nas par snang 'di las ni// ta la brgyad
127b6: babacu srid du mngon par 'phags/ / phyogs bcu dag na rnam dag rtul ba'i zhing // bzang la grangs mang sangs rgyas de mthong ste// mthong nas sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog dag la// tshigs bcad sna tshogs dag gis rgyal ba bstod//
127b7: 'gro ba pan ba med rgyal ba dgra ya rgyal// dbang po thul cing mnor de bzhin gsung // 'od mdzad bden gsung ldod la phyag 'tshal lo// bde gshegs cheg rmongs med la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas klu'i rgyal pa rgya mtshos bcom ldan
127b8: 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ / 'jigs sel sngags grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// spyad pa spyod tshe sun las ci bgyis pas// 'jigs las grol dang 'gro ba thar bgyid pa// 'jig rten lam zhugs bdag

128a1: la bka' stsa la gsol/ / ji ltar 'dren pa bdag nyid 'jigs grol zhing // skye bo 'jigs las rab tu grol mdzad pa// khyod kyis legs par gsungs pa'i bka' thos nas// de bzhin ngoms med yid kyis spyad par bgyi// chu
128a2: chen 'dzin pa klu'i rgya mtshodas/ / 'gro la pan phyir ston la zhu byed pa// 'jigs bcas zhe sar bcas shing de brten nas// mi dbang spyan sngar zhes bcas pas 'dug/ de yi bsam pa 'dren pas thugs chud nas// ji ltar spyad na 'jigs/
128a3: dang rnam bral zhing / sems can dag kyang 'jigs las thar byed pa// yan lag brgyad ldan gsung gis lung bstan to// byang chub spyad pa rjes su spyod bya zhing // dbyug mtshan med pas 'gro la rab tu ston// chu dang thang dang de bzhin g.yul
128a4: 'thab pa'i/ / 'jigs la yang dang la du 'jigs med sbyin/ de yis legs pa'i las ni byas pas na// 'jigs par mi 'gro byang chub reg 'gyur la// mnyam par gzhag pa'i byams pa'i sems kyis su// shin du mi bzad bdud stobs rab
128a5: skrasgraskrag byed/ / stobs bcu'i mkhyen pas rgya mtsho de dga' nas// de'i skad cigs la pus gtsugs te// 'jigs par mi gnas zhi bar rab 'dug nas// bde bar gshegs la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal byed// srid kun bdag la mi gnas phyag
128a6: 'tshal lo/ / ngang med 'jigs bral ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// dngang dang 'jigs las skye bo sbrul bgyi zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa mi dngang bdag 'gyur bgyi// de nas klu'i rgyal po gser gtsug gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su
128a7: bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis thub zhus pa/ / drang srong chen po spyan dge dbang po thul// srid pa'i rgya mtsho rgal cing pha rol phyin// bskam la bzhugs pa sred pa skams gang zag mchog/ 'gro ba'i don phyir khyod zhu bka' stsal gsol//
128a8: ji ltar spyad na bde gshegs bdag skye zhing // rgyal ba'i bstan la rab tu gnas 'gyur dang // bdud phrag stong dag gis kyang mi bskyod pa// kun spyan 'di dag bdag la bka' stsal gsol// sangs rgyas tshul la mi g.yo rab gnas

128b1: shing / klu'i gtso bos 'dren la de zhus pa// klu'i bdag po bsam pa thugs chud nas// nyon mongs kun spangs de ni lung bstan pa// lhag pa'i bsam pas chos kyi nges ldan zhing // nges pa stong pa'i yul la rab tu gnas// srid las
128b2: rnam rgyal bstan la mi g.yo zhing / / gzhal med byang chub la ni 'dun pa bskyed// gser gtsug rdzu 'phrul che ba'i klu de ni// sangs rgyas gsung ba thos nas the tsom med// byang chub phyir ni mi g.yo yid bskyed cing // 'jigs kun pha rol
128b3: byin la mngon par bstod/ / srid mtshon la cing skam la shin du bzhugs// the tsom mi mnga' mi g.yo brtan brnyes shing // srid par 'khor bstan bzhin du rab bzhugs pa/ ri rab ri la lha'i gnas bcas bzhin// 'di ltar mi g.yo ba la skyabs//
128b4: mchi zhing // mi g.yo ri lta bur ni 'gyur bar bgyi// de'i tshe 'gul dang mi 'gul zhing mi gnas// mi g.yo ri rab lta bur 'gyur bar bgyi// ma smad pas ni de yi thugs chud nas// yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis lung bstan pa// bskal pa
128b5: stong phrag brgyad bcur smad byas nas/ / ma 'ongs pa yi dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur// bde ba'i lam gyis rgyal bar 'gyur ba ste// mtshan ni legs mthong zhes bya shin du sdug/ srog chags bye ba stong phrag thar byed cing // bsil ba bde
128b6: bzhi pa'i lam 'god 'gyur/ / rgyal bas gsungs pa klu de thos nas su// gzhal med dga' ba'i sems ni rab dang bas// nyon mongs thams cad sel cing ma smad pa// 'gro ba'i 'dren pa la ni phyag 'tshal byed// de nas klu'i rgyal
128b7: po ud pa la mig gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ / mi mchog 'dul mdzad gzi brjid mtha' yas pa// thugs rab zhi zhing nyer zhe pha rol gshegs// zhi gnas yon tan rab 'i
128b8: rnam grol ba/ / zhi ba mkhas pa bde bar gshegs pa gsung // khyod sras byang chub ji ltar spyad bgyis na// zhi gnas dga' zhing zhi gnas bsten pa dang // zhi gnas la ni ji ltar mkhas par 'gyur// kun gzigs myur du bdag gi som

129a1: nyi kham/ rgyal ba la ni klu des zhus pa dang / rgyal bas ud pal mig la lung bstan pa// ga gis dge ba'i las kyis yid 'ong ba'i// zhi gnas la ni shin du bslabs par 'gyur// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni//
129a2: spyad pa srud tshe sems g.yar ma byed cing // bskal pabye bar zhi gnas bsnyen byas pa// byang chub dum pa dpa' mchog sangs rgyas 'phrur/ de yid raba'i byang chub rtogs nas sa// sa 'dren 'gro bzhi la b+h+yo byed cing / btu
129a3: sems zhi g.yo bar mi 'gyur la/ / sems can nyon mongs mi g.yo zhi bar byed// des pa su dpal meg gi klungs ni// rgyal bas legs par gsungs pa'i tshig thos nas// nyon mongs kun g.yo yid no na gyur te// bya chu
129a4: mchog rab sems ni skyed gyur to/ / de yi zhi gnas sems la brten nas su// byang chub sems bskyed rgyal ba de la bstod// khyod la bskyed nas zhi gnas rtogs gyur cing // shin tu yid zhe sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi// de nas klur/
129a5: rgyal po dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// bde bar gshegs pa zhi ga nas thugs su chud// rgyal ba gang zag mchog la bdag zhu ba// khyod nyid las 'khrungs byang chub rab gnas pa/
129a6: mi mchog ji ltar lhag mthong dag la spyad// mi 'dul kha lo sbyar la dga' bos zhus// klu de'i sngon gyi mtha' ni gzigs pas na// dge ba'i las bsags pa dag thugs chud nas// mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba 'di skad gsung // ye shes
129a7: dam pa byang chub mchog bcol phyir/ / ma zhu ma yid kyis nor dang 'bru dag la// ser sna med cing rdzas mang mi nyung dang / chung ma dang ni bdag nyid gtong bar byed// de yis legs pa'i las de byas pa dang // gtong ba shin du sdug bsngal
129a8: bsten pas na/ / ye shes dam pa bdag rgyal sangs rgyas 'gyur// de ni lhag mthong spyad pa'i 'bras bu yin// de nas gru'i rgyal po nye dgas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// 'gro ba kun gyi

129b1: 'dren la bdag thug/ / khyod sras byang chub de ltar smad ba gyis na// niganas lhag mthong mnyam par spyod pa dang // zangad cing med ni byang chub 'thab 'gyur lags/ 'dren pa de la klu des zhus pa dang // ni gnas lhag mthong yang dag
129b2: len byin pa/ gas pa med pa len pa'i sa bas pas/ ba gshegs pa'i ban lagan// khyang chubs pas dpa' ga sheg sung spyod pa/ nyid 'i rnabs 'di ma nyes par bstan pas// da ni bye ba zhwag khrigs pa sa
129b3: go mnyam par lag da/ / dal banyis mang pod / de gdas pa nga 'gyu // de mtha rdzogs pagal pa byem langs rgyas kyibs padapa dam myong// dem la dag
129b4: dga' yis/ / theg pa mnyam pa'i sngags po thos nas su// gzhal du med pa'i dga' bas sems bdenas// byang chub mchog gi sems rab bskyed gyur to// 'jig rten phan phyir byang chub de lung stan// sa 'ongs dus su sangs rgyas
129b5: 'gyur ba ste/ / ming ni rgyal ba 'dren pa kun sbyin no// thogs chags bye ba stong phrag zar bar byed// de nas kyu'i rgyal po ma dros pas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// bde gshegs khyod sras ni
129b6: ltar spyad bgyis na/ / 'gro ba'i don dra phan po tshol byed cing // byang chub bram tshol la mi stsog// ngaganyis dam pa mchog gis de lung ston// mi'i khyu mchog la ni klas zhus pa// klu'i bdag po'i bsam pa thugs chung de// thub pa sngon mthar
129b7: la gas pas/ bdag pa nams yang brnyan pa// rba bzhe bdud parjod ng+ge ga/ das shing rnams pa med pa byud pa dang // bdag dang gan dag la yangs da nga// se sna da cing ka ldan rgyal ba ma//
129b8: dmis legs pa'i las de byas pas na// gro bgang gis 'khor bar ni 'dod la// des shing thams cad du ni ting rjer ldan// byen pas ni sdud pa byed par 'gyur// de yis legs pa'i lam de byas pas na// nam durang skye

130a1: sdug bsngal yang 'grug ta pas rgyab dang da la/ / khan ma tha daci gnas ni nga// na pa gsung gas pa bskul bas na/ rag tu dag pas sems ni 'thung // las gad cigs pa
130a2: sa gtsugs nas/ / tshigs bcad sna tshogs dag gis rnal bstod pa// gauta ma 'jig rten kun nas mnyam med de// grob zil mnan pa da gshegs lhung reg// khyod kyin du ltar bcas 'gro kun la// 'di sa dathal mo sbyar nas/
130a3: skyabs su mchi// byang chub mchog gi yid ni bskyed bgyi zhing // 'di ltar bde gshegs khyod kyi ye shes dang // ston pa khyod kyis the tshom bsal ba ltar// bdag kyang thos nas 'jig rten the tshom bsal// de nas de'i ston gzhal med//
130a4: byang chub phyir// yid ni shin du dgyes nas bka' stsal pa// 'jig rten phan phyir 'dren par 'gyur ba yi// mi mchog ming ni dbang po chen po'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po I ra ba nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis
130a5: zhu ba zhus pa/ 'jig rten dpag med mang po'i skyabs kyi mchog/ rgyal bas the tsom gcod la zhu bgyi ba// byang chub sems dpas sug las ci bgyis na// sangs rgyas mngon du lhan cig phrad pa 'thob// 'jig rten mgon po de
130a6: la klus zhus nas/ / 'jig rten phan phyir 'dren pas lung bstan pa// sems can rgyud la nyon mongs rnam rig dang // yongs su dul ba'i yid ni rnam shes nas// 'gro la zan phyir snying rje bskyed nas su// byang chub mchog/
130a7: gi don du spyad pa spyod// bdag dang rgyal bar ji ltar phrad snyam nas// thabs la mkhas par mngon par rab gnas te// rgyal ba rnams dang bde gshegs mya ngan 'das// sku gdung dag la gzhal med mchod byed cing // rnam grol
130a8: yid kyis smon lam 'debs par byed/ / de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na// rtag tu sangs rgyas mngon par 'phrad 'thob ste// rgyal ba mngon sum mchod pa byas nas su// byang chub dga' ba 'od ldan reg par 'gyur//

130b1: sangs rgyas kyis ni legs gsungs tshig thos nas// e rab na klu ni yid mgu ste// gzhal du med pa'i dga' bas sems bdenas// dad pa'i yid kyis sangs rgyas mngon bstod pa// mi 'dul kha lo sgyur la phyag la
130b2: lo/ khyod kyis bdag giso ma nyi tha tsham gas la// byang chub don du yid 'di bskyed bgyi ste// sdug bsngal mthar bgyid sangs rgyas 'gyur bar brtsi// gang zag padag gis klu'i bdag po yi// bsam pazugs chung byung
130b3: chub lung bstan pa/ / bskal pa bye ba brgya 'dun bzhi du// spyod pa spyad nas de nas sangs rgyas 'gyur/ mi mchog mtshan ni thams cad sgrol ba ste// srog chags bye ba stong phrag zar bar byed// de yi ring bsrel mang por 'gyur ba ste//
130b4: skye bo mang po mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur// klu de ston pa'i gsung gis dga' gyur nas// 'jig rten phan mdzad rnam 'dren mngon bstod pa// khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don ni rgya cher mdzad// sdug bsngal mthar mdzad sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo//
130b5: bam po bcu gnyis pa// / de nas klu'i rgyal po cheb pa'i bus bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten don slad du// 'jig rten don mdzad rnam 'dren la zhu ba// sgra
130b6: pa spyod tshe sug las ci bgyis pas/ / ma rtogs rtogs nas rgyal ba rnam 'dren 'gyur// cheb pa'i bu des rgyal la mngon zhus nas// nyon mongs thams cad bsal bas lung bstan pa// dge ba'i las kyis 'bras bu yid 'o
130b7: zhing / / nyon mongs bcom pas des na rgyal zhes bya// de ni 'gro kun tshe dang sangs rgyas la// mchog tu dad pa dag gi sems kyang shes// de yis las kyis lam de byas pas na// 'gro ba'i brtag pa rgyal ba dag tu 'gyur// da yis rgyal
130b8: ba'i bshad pa thos nas su/ / 'gro ba thams cad la ni dad par byas// de tshe yis dge ba byas pas na// 'di yi smon lam btab ltar bdag 'gyur ro// de nas 'jig rten mgon pos de lung bstan// mi mchog sangs rgyas su ni 'gyur

131a1: blta/ sog chags bye ba stong phrag par byed cing // spyad pa spyod tshe rgyal ba mngon par bstod// smon pa'i gsung gis klu dag 'gyur nas// sangs rgyas la ni dad bskyed mdan bskrad pa// 'gre ba thar mdzad sangs rgyas phyag/
131a2: 'tshal lo// bsam yas bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal la// de nas klu'i rgyal po nag pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// drang srong chen po skyabs mchog dpag tu med// skyon dang bral zhing
131a3: yon tan mchog brnyes pa/ / stobs bcu'i 'jigs pas rnam gnon khyod la ni// byang chub zhi spyod mkhas pa rab gnas zhu// nges pa'i nyon mongs ji ltar bsal ba dang // rgyal ba'i mchog nyid ji ltar bsgom par gyi// bdud
131a4: kyi spyod yul de dag ji ltar spang / / sangs rgyas spyod yul dag la ji ltar spyad// rgyal ba la ni klu des zhus pa dang // ji ltar bde gshegs spyod yul spyad pa dang // ji ltar bdud kyi spyod yul spang ba dag/ lam gnyis shin du mkhyen
131a5: bas rab tu bstan/ / ston pa la ni klu bdag des zhus nas// de yi bsam pa thugs chud lung bstan pa// me mkhas gang dag sems can 'du shes spyod// de dag nag po'i rtsa lag spyod yul spyod// gang dag sems can med cing yid mi gan//
131a6: de dag thams cad gzigs pa'i spyod yul spyod// nag po'i rtsa lag dag las rgyal nas su// byang chub bla med zhi ba des thob bo// ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dag 'gyur nas// bdud kyi spyad yul myur bar rnam spangs te// sangs
131a7: rgyas thams cad gzigs ltar spyod yul dag/ bsten pas de ni myur du rgyal bar 'gyur// de nas klu'i rgyal po gau ta mas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// khaM lo sgyur mchog khyod la zhus kyi
131a8: ba/ 'dren pa khyod sras ji ltar spyad bgyis ma// klu'i skye gnas dag ni gcod bgyid cing // sangs rgyas tshul gyi myu gu bskyed par bgyid// bde bar gshegs la klu des zhus pa dang // de yi bsam pa thugs chud lung bstan pa// sems

131b1: can med la rgyal ba'i sras spyod cing / / byang chub sems la nams kyang de mi gnas// de ni stong nyid khong du chud pa yin// mkhas pa mtshan ma smon lam rnam spangs shing // 'dzangs pa mi dmigs pa la gnas pa dag/ 'di ni sangs rgyas chos
131b2: mngon myu gu bskyed/ / ston pa'i gsung gis klu de dga' gyur nas// mi dmigs pa la brten par rab gnas shing // bdud kyi zhags bcings dam pa bcad nas su// sangs rgyas tshul la gru ni rab tu gnas// 'jig rten mkhas pas byang chub de
131b3: lung bstan/ / ma 'ongs dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste// rnam thar rgyal zhes phyogs su rnam grags shing // bdud kyi dbang song srog chags thar bar byed// ston pa'i gsung gis glu de dga'agyur nas// thal mo sbyar nas sangs rgyas phyag
131b4: 'tshal byed/ / khyod kyi lam bstan pas na sangs rgyas bsten// mi mchog thar mdzad zhing la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas klu'i rgyal po kam pa la'i sgras bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// zla ba'i
131b5: 'od ltar dri med mthu che zhing / / mi mchog rang byung gyur la zhu bgyi ba// rnam 'dren sras ni ji ltar spyad bgyis na// phan par 'jug cing rjes su skye bar 'gyur// gal te stong nyid smon med rjes song zhing // phung po mtshan ma mi ldan
131b6: bral ba dang / / nam mkha' 'dra ba'i chos dang rnam shes na// pha yi lam du bu yang rjes 'gro 'gyur// ston pas legs par gsungs pa de dga' nas// dmigs su med pa yi ni sems bskyed do// 'jig rten mkhas pas byang
131b7: chub de lung bstan/ / rjes su 'thun 'di spyod pa spyad byas shing // zhing mchog dag kyad yongs su sbyangs nas su// ma 'ongs dus su sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste// zla bas lhag par phyogs su rnam grags shing // srid par 'gro ba
131b8: sems can thar bar byed/ / kam pa la zhes ming btags kla de ni// shAkya sras mkhas byang chub lung bstan nas// sems ni dga' zhing yongs su yid ma bu ste// 'gro kun thar bar mdzad la mngon bstod pa// thub pa che la 'di

132a1: ltar skyabs su mchi/ / sangs rgyas 'gyur bar the tshom bdag ma mchis// mun pa dag la sgron ma gzung bgyi zhing // long pa mig ma mchis la lam bstan bgyi// de nas klu'i bdag po yul 'khor bsrung
132a2: gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa/ / mgon po 'jig rten long bar 'gyur ba'i mig/ mig sbyin sman pa drang srong che la zhu// gang gis 'jig rten rnam thar lam bzang zhing // zhi ba'i sar
132a3: mchis rkang gnyis dbang po gsungs/ / stobs bcu'i stobs mda' rnam thar lam ston pa// 'jig rten mgon po rkang gnyis dbang pos de lung bstan// gang gis yun ring zhugs pa'i sdug bsngal lam zhi zhing // 'khor ba nyer
132a4: zhi mya ngan 'das pa gsal bar 'gro/ / ston la klu yi rgyal po lam zhi thos nas su// sdug bsngal ba la snying rje dam pa bskyed byas shing // klu'i rgyal pos byang chub 'dun pa drag bskyed de// stobs bcu'i stobs 'chang 'jig rten
132a5: mgon du bdag 'gyur byed/ / stobs bcu'i yon tan mnga' bas klu dbang lung bstan pa// mi yi seng ge bdag nyid mu stegs dgrar 'gyur zhing // sems can mtha' yas dpag med 'khor bar 'gro ba dag/ bde
132a6: gshegs mchog gi tshig gis 'dren cing thar par byed/ / ston pa'i gsung mchog klu'i rgyal pos thos nas su// dga' ba'i sems kyis sor bcu'i rtse mo rdal sbyar te// mi dbang 'jig rten mgon po drang srong chen po la//
132a7: gus pa bskyed nas 'khrul med tshig gis mngon bstod pa// skyabs mchog shin tu thugs gzhungs mtshungs med ye shes tog/ 'gro ba'i dge ba spyod cing dge la yun ring dang // 'gro ba'i bsam pa mtha' yas khyod kyis
132a8: thugs chung pas/ / des ni mi dbang khyod ni 'jig rten rgya cher grags// de nas klu'i rgyal po gser mgrin gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' stobs che stobs

132b1: dang ldan pa ste/ thugs dge sdang bad 'a dang ldan dang sdig mi ma nga'// srid rgyal blo gros pazang pos 'gro ba shin tum khyen// rgyal bdag kyang shan du dra ma zhal gsungs shig/ mag ma ma gdul bral byed sras rnga ltar
132b2: spyad bgyis na/ / mkhas pa ma dkrugs ma bskyod pa dag thugs chung cing // rgyal ba rdul bral dpag med brgya ni yongs su mkhyen// rgyal sras skye bo pan mdzad thugs su chud pa'i spyan// blo gros dpag med mda' ba lta mi mkhas pa
132b3: yis/ / bla mar bgyis shing rgyal ba dpag med sa yas bskor// mkhas pa dus su 'gro ba dpag med phan mdzad dgongs// stobs bcu mnga' bkru yi 'gro ba zhus pa gsungs// blo 'chal bral zhing blo ga tsang rjes dgongs brtag pa
132b4: mdzad/ de yi sras mchog rgyal bstan rga shi zad byed pa// 'thob cing rgyal bas mchod cing rdul med skyon bral re// 'gre ba'i sdug bsngal dpag med brgya shes yongs su 'grol// stobs bcu bro gros mnga' bas klu'i bdag po yig//
132b5: rga shi zad bya thos nas rab tu yid dga' ste// 'gro la phan yid dbyang chub yid byas rgyal ba'i mchog/ rnam 'dren blo mnga' 'gro la phan mdzad mngon bstod pa// 'gro ba mang po'i mun pa rab rib ling tog dag/ gcod mdzad
132b6: 'gro 'di'i sdug bsngal 'joms shing mun pa dang / / rab rib ling tog kun nas sal mdzad bdud rtsi'i lam// shin du dri med spyan mda' dge ba phyogs bcur ston// klu'i bdag po'i gser dngul lta bu'i khyim gshegs shing // yon
132b7: tan dpag med mnga' ba shin du thugs su chud/ / blo gros ston mdzad 'od zer stong 'dra'i spyan marang 'azhal// ma 'khrul ma glongs ma smad gzi che mkhas pa'i gtso// stobs bcu 'od chen mnga' la 'gro ba'i tshig gis brjod// rgyal
132b8: mchog bdag nyid bde ldan sangs rgyas byang chub nas/ / 'gro ba 'khyams shing ming na med ka shi sdug bsngal gyis// nyam thag sdug bsngal dpag med bsal te thar bar bgyi// bde dang zhi dang zhi ba rdul med rgya che se la// zhi ba'i lam

133a1: du zhugs nas bdag ni sangs rgyas bgyi/ / la ba brgya yis thugs drung bdud kyi stobs dag ni// stobs med pa kyi zhing mi mkhas padag gzhug par gyi// de nas kyi'i rgyal po mgri sngon gyis bcom ldan 'das mtshigs su
133a2: bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ / ston mchog 'dul ba kha lo sgyur la zhub gyi ba// 'dren pa khyod kyi sras ni ji ltar spyad bgyis na// khan ma tho med cing zhi la rdul bral dang // nyon mongs med cing byang chub dam pa sangs rgyas 'gyur/
133a3: 'gro ba'i don du 'dren pas gsungs bgang/ dpa' bo khyod nyid las 'khrungs sras thos nas// khan ma tho med cing bdag dang gzhan// sangs rgyas 'gyur dang byang chub the tshom khrum// mgrin sngon klu de yis ni zhus pa dang // 'jig rta
133a4: kun la chags pa med pa'i thugs/ / chos rnams kun la mi 'jigs dbang brnyes shing // ston pa'i gsung la legs gnas lung bstan pa// nga sras 'jig rten gsum lam chags shing // 'grol phan par spyad pa spyod byed
133a5: pa/ 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dag dang // gzugs med khams su'ang tshad du mi skye'o// mya ngan 'das dbyings gzhal mad 'dus ma byas// thams cad kyi ni sdug bsngal zad cing 'gog/ de ni nyer bzung 'jig
133a6: rten gos med yin/ / rgyal ba rgyal ba'i dbang po rab du bsgom// de yis legs pa'i las de byas pas na// gos pa med cing 'jigs med rnam spyod la// bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa med gnas te// bdag nyid bla med byang chub
133a7: mngon 'chang rgya/ / de ni rnam srin de las rjes 'thun pa// shin du dga' bas byang chub 'chang rgyar 'gyur// de yi skye bo srog chags lnga dang m+bu// mi dang srin po dag gis mi mthong ngo // klu mgrin sngon po stobs po che ni/ sa ma/
133a8: rgyas kun mkhyen gsung gis dga' gyur nas// sor mo bcu'i thal sbyar mgo btud de// 'jig rten sgron mdzad 'dren la phyag 'tshal byed// ma mchog la ni 'di ltar bdag skyabs mchi// yab kyi rjes su sras kyang mchi bgyi

133b1: shig/ sang byed btsas la byang chub nga gyur gyi// sems can sngags sa sa / gyu grol// ga tan ma khas pas byung na ba lung bsta// bya napa 'angs dus sul u0f7f/ s+yA nas phyag/
133b2: sun ma grags shing // 'gro ba'i srid las sems can grol bar byed// de nas klu'i rgyal po 'jigs sgrogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// mi 'dul ba ko sbyong ba yid las
133b3: 'das/ / ston pa sug las ci bgyis bdag zhu'o// rgyal ba de ni sngam phyogs gzigs pa na/ dkyil 'khor tsam gyis ni bdun du 'gyur// chos la nges pa'i rgyal bas de lung bstan// kun mkhyen mkhyen pas pasam pa
133b4: thugs rlung nas/ / bla na med pa'i thugs ni bskyed mdzad de// de bzhin mi mchog gis ni 'di lung bstan// bde ba 'byung ba dag gi las byas shing // de dag sngon chad yang dang yang dran pas// de'i rnam smin las ni 'di ltar shes/
133b5: de yi gzigs pangs ni 'gyur ba yin// rgyal bas legs gsungs tshig ni thos nas su// rgyal de ni mchog du dag 'gyur nas// phags pa zang cing med pa'i dga' bskyed de// dargyal bcom nas sangs rgyas bya
133b6: 'tshal byed/ / de nas klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu bkrus pa// laT stong bal lam ni bston cing // 'jig rten don mdzad 'den la bu gyi ba/ sngon tag
133b7: phrin las ci mdzad na/ / ji lta dgongs pa bzhin du niganas ma da// 'jig rten mgon pos rgyal bas de lung bstan// sems can ku ni 'dul ba'i dus pab cing // 'gro ba thams cad la ni phan pa'i phyir// dren pa bdud ma
133b8: 'joms pas lung bstan pa/ / 'das pa'i dus su spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// tshul bzhin ma yin sems dang gnyen min pa'i// rnams kyang mi sems rtag du zhig nas bsten// de la ngas ni yun ring bslabs pa yin// de bzhin/

134a1: rgyal bdag gi mchod rten la// phreng ba ran chen dag ni bkram zhing phul// de yis legs pa'i las de byas pa na// nyon mongs sems dang rnams kyang mi gnas so// yis bsngal ba sod phrag
134a2: ba ru/ / gzhan la gnod pas nams kyang gnod ma byas// da ni de yis las kyi rnam smin rkus// ji ltar bsams bzhin zhi gnas sten par byed// drang srong che bas lung bstan 'di thos nas// gzi
134a3: can kunani dga' bar gyur pa na/ / gan du med pa'i bde bas sems dga' nas// ston pa'i mdun 'dug tshigs su bcad pas bstod// 'gro ba'i kun ldang nyon mongs zhe mdzad cing // de dag sems zhi khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad// thub pa nyon
134a4: mongs med par 'jig rten spyod/ / zla 'od lta bur blo zhi phyag 'tshal lo// de nas klu'i rgyal po rnam par snang byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// sngon tshe dag tu phrin las ci mdzad na//
134a5: thub pa khyod kyi sku la rdul mi gos// dpe med rnams gnon 'di dag bdag la gsungs// gang dag thos nis dge ba'i las skyed bgyi// rnam par snang byed dge ba tshol ba'i klus// 'jig rten mgon de la ni zhus pa dang / nyon mongs
134a6: kun sa la yan lag brgyad ldan zhing / / snyan cing 'jebs pa'i sgras ni lung bstan pa// nga yis sngon chad byang chub tshol ba na// nams kyang tshul bzhin ma yin ngas ma bsams// nams kyang rab tu nyes sems ngas ma
134a7: bskyed/ / bla med byams las yang dang yang du byas// nga yis dge ba'i las de byas pas na// bla med byang chub zhi ba reg nas su// mi mchog rgyal ba thub pa'i sku dag dang // na bza' la yang rdul gyis mi gos so// rgyal ba'i phrin las
134a8: dge bsags de thos nas/ / rnam par snang byed klu ni yid dga' ste// sor bcu'i thal mo sbyar nas mgo bo yis// rgyal ba'i zhabs la mngon par phyag 'tshal byed// legs so rgyal ba mu byed sngon du gshegs// khyod kyis

134b1: rgya che mtha' yas don dag mdzad/ / srid pa'i tshogs la dga' zhing sdug bsngal gyis// gdungs pa'i 'gro ba mtha' dag khyod kyis bkrol// skye bo drug gdug rig pa'i sman pa ste// skye bo drug bcom khyod ni gso sman lags//
134b2: me 'bar zhi ltar rim gyis mya ngan 'da'// 'di ltar thal sbyar mgos bdud stabs sumache// de nas klu'i rgyal po bsgyings pas bcom ldan 'das la tshogs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// rnam 'dren dge ba'i
134b3: phrin las ci mdzad na/ / zhabs ni shin du mnyam zhing bstan pa brnyes// gang dag thos nas shin du yid dga' 'thob// mi yi mchog gur de dag bdag la gsungs// klu yi rgyal po bsgyings pas rnam par 'dren// 'jig
134b4: rten mkhas la de yis zhus pa dang / / yid du 'ong ba'i tshigs bcad sna tshogs kyis// klu'i rgyal ba'i yid ni dga' bar gyur// yis tshul khrims brtul zhugs rnam par bsgrubs// nga yis gzhan yang tshul khrims brtul
134b5: zhugs bsgoms/ / ngas ni dge ba'i las de byas pas na// rkang pa mnyam pa dag gis sa la reg/ de tshe thams cad mkhyen pas lung bstan pa// rdul bral klu ni yid dga' mgu gyur nas// gzhal du med pa'i bde bas saurma/
134b6: dga' ste// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog la phyag 'tshal byed// legs so rgyal ba 'od mdzad rdul bcom zhing / shin du nyon mongs bag chags bcas pa bcom// zla nye dkyil 'khor skrag can gyis bta ba ltar// dgra
134b7: bcom nas ni phyogs rnams rab tugs la/ / de nas klu'i rgyal po 'od chen gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten sman slad du// 'jig rten 'das
134b8: gsung 'dren la zhu bkyi sa/ / rkang gnyis dam pa sug las ci bgyis na// ma 'dren gnas ma lags pa 'tshal ba 'thog// sngon tsha dag tu spyad pa spyod pa na// lus dang ngag me dang ni sems kyis kyang // 'ad pa 'byung

135a1: pa'i yang dag las byas te/ / sa gang byas pas rnams kyang gdum 'ar// bdu dag lad dgebs brnyan pa dang // gnamam man pa lam shAn 'du na/ na las kyil pa /
135a2: par sbyangs// gnas ma yin pa'i nyon mongs thams cad bcom// rnam 'dren da yis las de mdzad pas na// 'di nas 'phos nas gzhan 'phrul dag tu gshegs// mi yi 'jig rten brnyes nas der 'das te// bla mas
135a3: gnas ma yin pa shes pa 'thog/ / gnas ma yin pa shes la rnams kyang ni/ bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyis bskyod mi nus// sems dang de bzhin nyan mongs yad grol te// de bzhin gshegs pas 'gro kun rab tu mkhyen/
135a4: ston pas lung bstan pas ni 'od chen kla// yid na mgu zhing shin tu dga' 'gyur te// gzhal du med pa'i bde bas sems dga' nas// yon tan pha rol gshegs la phyag 'tshal byed// shin du thugs dul yid gnyis
135a5: mas pa'o/ / dam las rnal cing skamal shin du bcug/ chen nal cing ba cwo la ma dag/ ji lta nyams man pa bas la nas sa// gzugs kyi rnas pa skang shingagasal ba ltang/ de bzhin ston pa
135a6: khyos/ sems ca dug sngal ma shAn ba sa ga/ lag su dgas pa'i khyad pa tsham mo// nam la kho thags kyang kyis bcom ldan 'dapa 'a tshigasas pad pa bya
135a7: ga/ la ba gabang mdog sbyin las kyi mang du na/ sa gas mamakhyen pa bcug napar bzhugs// nam mkha' bu mkhyen ldan sa / gro ba'i zhin pade dag padag lags / ga
135a8: maudas byed pa mthunas namatshanas she/ / pam nyas de la tshams la mad dag/ rgyal bar byung thugs kyab de'i bsapa pa// shin thugs chud dani yang dpa/ ga su / badran ldan sbyin byed cag

135b1: nges pa'i las byas pas ni bde 'byung dang / / rtag tu gzhan yang shes la 'jog byed cing // bdag nyid ji tsam shes pa ser sna med// mkhas pa de yis las de byas pas na// lus zhig nas ni gzhan 'phrul
135b2: ngag tu 'gro/ / 'dod pa dag na spyod pa'i lha gnas dang // thur dra 'bab cing mi'i nang du 'byung // dus gsum shes la rnam par rtse byed cing // bdag dang de bzhin gzhan yang shes par byed// lpags pa srab cang blo dang ldan gyur pa//
135b3: bde gshegs thogs pa med pas lung bstan to// shin tu blo ldan mchog gis bstan thos nas// glu chen rab tu gdung byed dga' gyur te// byang chub gzhal du med la rab gnas shing // yang dag bsngags pas mi mchog
135b4: rgyal ba stod/ / dus gsum mtshan nyid gcig tu gzigs mdzad cing // las dang rnam smin de bzhin rab tu mkhyen// sems can dag/ gi khyad par bde ba mkhyen// bde gshegs thams cad gtong la phyag 'tshal lo//
135b5: de nas klu'i rgyal po stobs chen gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ mi mchog mchog rab mkhyen pa mtha' yas pa// mgon po rdul bral thugs ni yongs su dag/ bdag gi so ma
135b6: myang so la the chom yang / / spen pa dbum myur bad par gshegs pas gsungs// ji gar sngon mod lta ga shis/ srag las bgyis pablo mkhas ji ltar 'tshal// ji ltar bu ming byang chub mtshag thob pa/ bdag gis
135b7: the mam thus pa myur bar gsungs/ / stobs bcu'i stobs mkhyen bdag nyid shin du sa// rgyal bal+la yis zhus pa myur gsung ste// da yis ji ltar mi yi spyong kun dang // dge ba'i bsam pas byang chub tshol byud cing /
135b8: rnga ltar yad rab dga' bas bsgrubs pa dang // ji ltar skyes bu sdug bsngal gyis gnod cing // tha ma mthong la ngan 'gror ltung ba dang // nyon mongs brgya yis mun par gyur pa shes// der ni sems can snying pos snying rje bskyed/

136a1: dmamamams can 'dis/ ma nga/ cu pa'i mamam ya ga sa gagalas nA g+sar+b+ha/ sa lam ma ga pa ga// da las rdzung na can pa ga/
136a2: skakhas pa'i lam sa ga ldan pa na// yan me dan pon dan d+hAr // de ltar bstan pa da ni m+b+hi rdzabastang/ drang grang chen pa dis tshul bsgrubs nas sa// ga nga mig nga bzhin gdag n-i// ga nas
